reviews.name: Animal Print Welcome Doormat, 2'5" x 1'6"
reviews.reviewText: The doormats are absolutely awesome .. Very functional and of high quality.
reviews.title: African Animal print

reviews.name: Animal Print Welcome Doormat, 2'5" x 1'6"
reviews.reviewText: This rug is great in quality and definitely a must have for your front entrance! I have double doors so I bought two and placed two large zebra print planters one on each side. I planted in each, double knockout rose trees...and Bam! It instantly gave my entrance a classy and unique look! Walmart, please tell the manufacturer of this rug to make it in a longer version for people with double doors, you'll make more money!
reviews.title: Has that WOW factor!

reviews.name: Animal Print Welcome Doormat, 2'5" x 1'6"
reviews.reviewText: It's the cutest mat ever! Online doesn't give it its justice! It's about the most perfect doormat! Very girly! And fits a girls home perfectly!
reviews.title: In love with!!

reviews.name: Animal Print Welcome Doormat, 2'5" x 1'6"
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome doormat. If you love animal print, you will love this. Brilliant color schemes. Top Quality.
reviews.title: Animal Print Welcome Doormat
